resources.string:
Welcome to the Tutorial! This is where we will be giving you instructions as to how to use this app.

 1. Please put on the shirt and ensure that the pads are attached to your skin as shown below.

Ensure that there are no excess lotion or oils on your skin to ensure better connection of the pads.

 2. Press the START button on the HOME page to start real time monitoring.

 HOME tab: Location of START and STOP button for ECG readings.

 BASELINE tab: Location of baseline image used for comparison purposes. New baseline needs to be recalibrated every six months.

 HISTORY tab: Listing of medical history.

 CONTACT INFO tab: Input Primary and Secondary contact information. They will be contacted automatically if an emergency occurs.

Grace Li
 Monica Nasralla
 Radu Baciu
 Youstina Abdelsayed
